title: Luxury House for Sale in Barns Place, Colombo 7
details:
Luxury House for Sale in Barns Place in Colombo 7
Prime residential area in heart of central Colombo 7 for a prestigious living and for a glorious residence with a large land extent in the area.
Also this is the last large land extent to buy with a clear title and ownership in Colombo 7 area.
30 perches of prime land in a private lane and on a wide lane front
Large solidly built house on the property and only need little refurbishments to upgrade the house from the present position
Rs 16 million per perch and open for negotiations for the right buyer
Ideal investment opportunity and higher value appreciation for the property
